question: Will the CDU/CSU receive more than 30% of votes?
description:
The 2024 European Parliament election in Germany is scheduled to be held on June 9, 2024.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the CDU/CSU (Christian Democratic Union and Christian Social Union) combined receive over 30% of votes cast in the 2024 European Parliament election in Germany. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the results of this election are not known by December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: $AMC all time high by Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if AMC Entertainment Holdings, Inc. ($AMC) stock reaches a new all time high price by market close on May 17, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Only trading prices recorded during official market hours will count toward this market's resolution.

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible financial sources.

question: Will a Democrat win the popular vote and the Presidency?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if a Democratic candidate wins both the popular vote and the Presidency in the 2024 U.S. Presidential Election. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for the popular vote will be an overwhelming consensus of credible reporting as to who is the winner of the popular vote.

The resolution source for the winner of the Presidency will be the Associated Press, Fox News, and NBC. This market will resolve once all three sources call the race for the same candidate. If all three sources haven’t called the race for the same candidate by the inauguration date (January 20, 2025) this market will resolve based on who is inaugurated.

events.title: Who wins Presidency + Popular Vote?
events.description: This is a market on predicting which political party will win both the presidential election and the popular vote in the upcoming election.

The resolution source for the winner of the Presidency will be the Associated Press, Fox News, and NBC. This market will resolve once all three sources call the race for the same candidate. If all three sources haven’t called the race for the same candidate by the inauguration date (January 20, 2025) this market will resolve based on who is inaugurated.

events.title: Who wins Presidency + Popular Vote?
events.description: This is a market on predicting which political party will win both the presidential election and the popular vote in the upcoming election.

question: Boston Celtics vs Cleveland Cavaliers: Game 5
description:
This market refers to Game 5 of the NBA Playoff series between the Boston Celtics and Cleveland Cavaliers.

If the Boston Celtics win, the market will resolve to “Celtics”.

If the Cleveland Cavaliers win, the market will resolve to “Cavaliers”.

If the game is not completed by May 22, 2024 (11:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.

description:

description:

question: $GME halted on Wednesday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if trading on the GameStop Corp stock ($GME) has any LULD pauses applied to it on May 15, 2024, between market open and market close. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be the NYSE (https://nyse.com/trade-halt).

question: Will Max Homa win the 2024 PGA Championship?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Max Homa wins the 2024 PGA Championship tournament. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The primary resolution sources will be official information from the PGA Championship (https://www.pgachampionship.com/).

This market may immediately resolve to “No” if this golfer is eliminated or otherwise has no path to victory based on the rules of the 2024 PGA Championship Tournament.

question: Will Tiger Woods win the 2024 PGA Championship?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Tiger Woods wins the 2024 PGA Championship tournament. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The primary resolution sources will be official information from the PGA Championship (https://www.pgachampionship.com/).

This market may immediately resolve to “No” if this golfer is eliminated or otherwise has no path to victory based on the rules of the 2024 PGA Championship Tournament.

question: Will someone else win the 2024 PGA Championship?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if anyone other than Scottie Scheffler, Rory McIlroy, Brooks Koepa, Xander Schauffele, Jon Rahm, Ludvig Aberg, Bryson DeChambeau, Max Homa, or Tiger Woods wins the 2024 PGA Championship tournament. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The primary resolution sources will be official information from the PGA Championship (https://www.pgachampionship.com/).

This market may immediately resolve to “No” if every golfer other than those previously listed is eliminated or otherwise has no path to victory based on the rules of the 2024 PGA Championship Tournament.

question: Will Ilya join another company?
description:
On May 14, Ilya Sutskever announced he was leaving OpenAI, and he would share his next endeavor in due time (see https://twitter.com/ilyasut/status/1790517455628198322).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Ilya Sutskever announces he is joining another existing company/organization other than Anthropic, Google, X, and Apple by May 31, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

The primary resolution source will be statements from Ilya.

question: Ilya joins a new company?
description:
On May 14, Ilya Sutskever announced he was leaving OpenAI, and he would share his next endeavor in due time (see https://twitter.com/ilyasut/status/1790517455628198322).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Ilya Sutskever announces he is joining or founding a newly created company/organization by May 31, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

This market may immediately resolve once Ilya Sutskever announces his new endeavor.
